description: This table contains information from pharmacy claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record

columns.name: PRIM_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The primary medical payer. This is only set when the primary medical payer is different than the primary pharmacy payer.

columns.name: PRIM_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: BCDA_GROUP_IDENT
columns.description: Claim group identifier provided by Beneficiary Claims Data API (BCDA)

columns.name: TOT_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: Total patient portion

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_INCOMING_CEV_ID
columns.description: The most recent incoming Claim External Values (CEV) record ID

columns.name: CLAIM_HEADER_ID
columns.description: Holds the claim header ID for the claim received from raw data

columns.name: ADJ_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Holds the adjustment sequence for the claim received from raw data

columns.name: ADJ_TO_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Holds the adjustment to claim ID for the claim received from raw data

columns.name: REV_TO_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Holds the reversal to claim ID for the claim received from raw data

columns.name: IS_CLINICALLY_VALID_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether a claim is considered valid for the purpose of clinical data derivation 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: KLCTCEV_RECORD_ID
columns.description: Holds the CEV ID containing the KLCT metadata for a reversal claim.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the workflow payer associated with this claim

columns.name: WORKFLOW_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORG_ID
columns.description: The source organization of the external record.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: LOOP_OR_SPLIT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a claim is part of an adjustment sequence that contains a split claim or an adjustment sequence loop. This CLM does not have to be in the split or loop istelf, just a part of the adjustment sequence.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_CLINICALLY_VALID_YN

columns.name: EXTERNAL_DEMOG_ID
columns.description: Holds a pointer to the REQ record that holds the identifier and demographics that this claim was received with, linking this claim into an ID bundle.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This is the ID of the benefit plan used to adjudicate a claim.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: CLM_LOB_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the line of business associated with the claim. This is the LOB determined at adjudication.

columns.name: CLM_LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: IN_OUT_OF_NET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the network level of a claim.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


IN NETWORK


OUT OF NETWORK


N/A

columns.name: CLAIM_PAID_DATE
columns.description: The date that the claim was paid, which is determined by the date the claim reaches the AP Status EOB Generated

columns.name: CLAIM_NAT_KEY_HASH
columns.description: The hashed value of the mapped claim natural key.

columns.name: CLAIM_NAT_KEY_ORDER
columns.description: The ordering value for the claim natural key.

columns.name: CLM_ADJ_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Claim Adjustment Type Code


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Original


Adjustment


Reversal

columns.name: NAT_KEY_FINAL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a claim is the final action of an adjustment sequence that is tracking adjustments via natural keys. Natural key adjustments are tracked using superitem CLM 18690. A claim is the final action of its natural key if it has the maximum order value (item 18692) for a given natural key (item 18691). If there is a tie, the claim with the largest claim header id (item 18681) is deemed the final action. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_CLINICALLY_VALID_YN

columns.name: CLAIM_SVC_CLASS_CTX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Represents a high-level clinical classification context of the services billed for on this claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inpatient


Outpatient


Professional Services


Pharmacy


Lab Services


Hospice


Not Classified

columns.name: CLAIM_SVC_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Represents a clinical classification for the services billed on this claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Acute Inpatient


Other Inpatient


Skilled Nursing


Inpatient Psychiatric Care


Inpatient Rehabilitation Care


Hospice


Home Health


Outpatient


Emergency


Specimen Only


Pharmacy


Observation


Urgent Care


Surgery


Nursing Facility


Residential Facility Services


Office Visit


Substance Abuse and Behavioral Health Services


Ambulance


Telemedicine


Home Visit


Outpatient Rehabilitation Services


Independent Laboratory


Inpatient Part B


Inpatient Part B Preventive Services


Skilled Nursing Part B


Skilled Nursing Part B Preventive Services


Not Classified

columns.name: CLIN_FILTER_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Last UTC instant clinical data derivation filters (I CLM 18625) were updated or calculated without changes for this claim.

columns.name: CLIN_FILTER_DTTM
columns.description: Last local instant clinical data derivation filters (I CLM 18625) were updated or calculated without changes for this claim. Calculated using EPIC_UTC_TO_LOCAL on I CLM 18626.
